column4: can anyone reccommend a tiling window manager please? im interested in trying one.
Depends on what you want. Right now, I'm using wmii, and it's pretty easy to pick up/modify
i love the cleanliness and keybindability of openbox, so something along those lines with tiling please.

Most of the differences between tiling WMs is in the language they use for configs. Wmii uses bash,s so it's pretty easy to understand and pick up, but Awesome is nice if you know lua, and openbox has the "Poor man's Tiling" somewhere.
